template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the education space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Design an end-to-end content campaign to launch an educational product, starting with audience research, then producing blog posts, videos, and social assets, ensuring consistent messaging across all platforms, and aiming for a 15% increase in demo requests.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt for an education content campaign. The key requirements are: end-to-end task, research, multi-format content, cross-channel consistency, and measurable goals. Need to keep it under 45 words.

Okay, let's break it down. "Education space" suggests academic or learning topics. "Research" implies background work. "Multi-format" means articles, videos, etc. "Consistency across channels" requires unified messaging. "Measurable goals" needs KPIs.

How about combining all elements? Start with the action verb "Design" to imply end-to-end ownership. Specify "educational product launch" as the scenario. List research and formats concisely. Mention channel alignment and measurement targets. 

Check word count... 31 words. Yes, that fits. The prompt covers all requested aspects without extras.
